item.title: About the node pathogens portal
item.description: About The Pathogens Portal is a platform for sharing data and analysis results on infectious diseases. The portal is designed to be a regional hub for researchers, public health officials, and the general public to access and share data on infectious diseases. The Pathogen Portal Nodes(PPN) will be a part of the Pathogen Data Network (PDN) working in collaboration with Central Pathogens Portal. For more information about PPN and PDN checkout this onboarding material.

item.title: Contact and suggestions form
item.description: For any questions regarding onboarding or the project, kindly contact the Pathogen data network.

item.title: Dashboards developed by international data services and resources
Dashboards developed by the Portal Node or its user community
item.description: Under this section, dashboards developed by local user communities using software components developed by the Pathogens Data Network project. For example, see SARS-CoV-2 variants dashboard in the Swedish pathogens portal.

item.title: Demo Topic 1
item.description: This is a demo topic, checkout “bacteria” topic in Swiss pathogens portal or “mpox” topic in Swedish pathogens portal.
